ViewPoint.description: This calc is intented to be used as a Basic Thesaurus editor, whose underlying used language is SKOS (Simple Knowlege Organization System) and which is an RDF vocabulary for describing the basic structure and content of concept schemes such as thesauri, classification schemes, subject heading lists, taxonomies, 'folksonomies', other types of controlled vocabulary, and also concept schemes embedded in glossaries and terminologies.

Parameter.name: conceptSchemeName
Parameter.label: concept_scheme_name
Parameter.description: Allow to enter concept scheme name while dropping concept scheme

Parameter.name: conceptSchemeURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: conceptName
Parameter.label: concept_name
Parameter.description: Allow to enter concept scheme name while dropping concept scheme

Parameter.name: conceptURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) name used in Ontology

EditionPattern.name: ConceptToConceptSchemeRelationship
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define link between a concept and a concept scheme

Parameter.name: makeInverseRelationship
Parameter.label: make_inverse_relationship
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that inverse relationship must be defined

EditionPattern.name: ConceptSpecialization
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define link between a concept and a other concept with a specialization semantic

Parameter.name: match
Parameter.label: match
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that broadMatch property should be used

Parameter.name: makeInverseRelationship
Parameter.label: make_inverse_relationship
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that inverse relationship must be defined

EditionPattern.name: ConceptGeneralization
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define link between a concept and a other concept with a specialization semantic

Parameter.name: match
Parameter.label: match
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that broadMatch property should be used

Parameter.name: makeInverseRelationship
Parameter.label: make_inverse_relationship
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that inverse relationship must be defined

EditionPattern.name: ConceptRelatedRelationship
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define link between a concept and a other concept with a "related-to" semantic

Parameter.name: match
Parameter.label: match
Parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that relatedMatch property should be used

LocalizedDictionary.Localized: Make both concepts related to each other
